Blog.post: monday july 19, 2004 11:15pm today was soo cool...i got to hang out with the girl i like so very very much.i like her because of her individuality and her very stong will power to do prutty much anything.but i dont think she know that i like her..i should of told her today because i was with her for a couple hours but i dunno if i should her in privet or in front of everyone i dont think she cares but i think i will care because caring is what i do...well, oneof my things i do, lol.but one thing i dont understand is that what do some people find her unattractive. i think she is one of the most beautiful people in the whole wide world (not that i`ve met people in different contries) well.....this is a privet matter and i will NOT discuse any farther.unless she said so -anthony

june thursday 29 9:57am im soo hapy..i cant belive school is finishing and its the summer..and my BIRTHDAYand im going to invite all my friends and i hope i go go-karting or paintballing becasuei heard there very fun and painful but i dunno who im going to invite becasue i got someny friends...like ryan and cameron,connor,david,mark,ling feng,andrew,march,mel,connie,jessi,kayla,katie,alicha,lizzy and more but i cant think of anymore becasue i woke up too earlytoday, but in the summer, you can go to bed late and wake up late and it dosent matter. -anthony

june, tuesday 02 5:06pm im depressed more than ever becasue of all the people at school...they havebeen trying to turn me into something im not, by telling me im the coolest and telling mei can get all the hot and sexy girls! well what if i dont want all the nice looking girlsand i want the smart and girls that i think are naturaly beautiful not 100% cosmetics.i wish people would stop telling me what to do, i like to live my life My WAY BECASUE ITS MY LIFE! - anthony

march wednesday 17, 2004 4:26pm I CANT BELIVE I DID THAT, that stupid lady convinced me that my family hated me and thati should call "child aid". i am even more depressed becasue of this..only if my dad did blame me on everything.but i called child aid and i hate the counciler becasue she freakin backstabed me! i love my family very much and i would never do anything to harm them or anyone in anywaybecause i love everyone and i would never harm anyone unless them harmed one of my friends or myselve. -anthony
